-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azcurateddatalakeash.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxi/nyctaxi-curated-df/transactions/green-taxi/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azcurateddatalakeash.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxi/nyctaxi-curated-df/transactions/yellow-taxi/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
